entry.title: How to initial an array with default value of n zero

link.title: How to initial an array with default value of n zero

entry.content:
• How to initial an array with default value of n zero?
    • Init(repeating: #Value, count: #n)
  • How to get bitmap data of UIImage? How to get color of specific pixel?
    • Let width = image.size.width
    • Let height = image.size.height
    • Let provider = image.cgImage!.dataProvider
    • Let providerData = provider!.data
    • Let data = CFDataGetBytePtr(providerData)
    • Let numberOfComponents = 4
    • Let offset = (width * y + x) * numberOfComponents
    • Let a = data![offset]
    • Let r = data![offset + 1]
    • Let g = data![offset + 2]
    • Let b = data![offset + 3]
  • How to change 0xff to 0xff00?
    • First, from 0xff -> 0xff0, value is multiplied by 0x10 or 16
    • So, from 0xff -> 0xff00, value is multiplied by 0x100
  • How to loop from high value down to small value? How to custom loop start value and end value and step?
    • For i in stride(#startValue, through: #endValue, by: #offset)
  • 1s = ?ms
    • 1000
  • How to change a color image to gray image?
    • Use cifilter
entry.summary: How to initial an array with default value of n zero? Init(repeating: #Value, count: #n) How to get bitmap data of UIImage? How to get color of specific pixel? Let width = image.size.width Let height = image.size.height Let provider = image.cgImage!.dataProvider Let providerData = provider!.data Let data = CFDataGetBytePtr(providerData) Let numberOfComponents = 4 Let offset = (width * y + x) * numberOfComponents Let a = data![offset] Let r = data![offset + 1] Let g = data![offset + 2] Let b = data![offset + 3] How to change 0xff to 0xff00? First, from 0xff -> 0xff0, value is multiplied by 0x10 or 16 So, from 0xff -> 0xff00, value is multiplied by 0x100 How to loop from high value down to small value? How to custom loop start value and end value and step? For i in stride(#startValue, through: #endValue, by: #offset) 1s = ?ms 1000 How to change a color image to gray image? Use cifilter

entry.title: How can you copy an array with Int?

link.title: How can you copy an array with Int?

entry.content:
• How to get diff of current git folder with Kaleidoscope?
    • Set Kaleidoscope as merge and diff tool
    • gdt
  • How to remove duplicated elements in array?
    • Make element conform to Equatable protocol
    • Use reduce
  • How can you copy an array with Int?
    • Var newArr: [Int] = oldArr
    • Value type array are automatically copied
  • How can you get a deep copy of an array with objects?
    • Enum each objects and get a copy of object
    • If you only var newArr = oldArr, you will get a new arrary filled with old elements
entry.summary: How to get diff of current git folder with Kaleidoscope? Set Kaleidoscope as merge and diff tool gdt How to remove duplicated elements in array? Make element conform to Equatable protocol Use reduce How can you copy an array with Int? Var newArr: [Int] = oldArr Value type array are automatically copied How can you get a deep copy of an array with objects? Enum each objects and get a copy of object If you only var newArr = oldArr, you will get a new arrary filled with old elements

entry.title: How to clip web page to PDF on iPhone

link.title: How to clip web page to PDF on iPhone

entry.content:
• How to clip web on iPhone?
    • On Chrome
      • Install PDF Viewer
      • Tap share button on top right
      • Tap “Import to PDF Viewer”
      • Save to open pdf viewer
    • On Safari
      • Tap share button on bottom bar
      • Tap “Import to PDF Viewer”
        • Save and open pd viewer
      • Or tap “Create PDF”
    • How to enum an enum?
      • Make enum conform protocol CaseIterable
      • Then you can call allCases on enum type
    • How to change [(key, value)] to dictionary?
      • Dictionary(uniqueKeyWithValues: [(key, value)])
entry.summary: How to clip web on iPhone? On Chrome Install PDF Viewer Tap share button on top right Tap “Import to PDF Viewer” Save to open pdf viewer On Safari Tap share button on bottom bar Tap “Import to PDF Viewer” Save and open pd viewer Or tap “Create PDF” How to enum an enum? Make enum conform protocol CaseIterable Then you can call allCases on enum type How to change [(key, value)] to dictionary? Dictionary(uniqueKeyWithValues: [(key, value)])

entry.title: Will isDecerating be true when you call selectItemAt:postion:animated: of UIScrollView?

link.title: Will isDecerating be true when you call selectItemAt:postion:animated: of UIScrollView?

entry.content:
• What is sectionInsect in UICollectionView?
    • Top is the first cell’s top from bottom of headerView. Be careful, top is not calculated from the top of headerView to previous section.
  • Will isDecerating be true when you call selectItemAt:postion:animated: of UIScrollView?
    • isDecerating is true when scrollView is moving after user lifts finger
    • So this is not called, when you set UIScrollView’s offset with animation.
  • How to implement cell’s size changing animation.
    • Implement new size in collectionView:collectionViewLayout:sizeForItem:
    • Call collectionView.collectionViewLayout.invalidateLayout()
entry.summary: What is sectionInsect in UICollectionView? Top is the first cell’s top from bottom of headerView. Be careful, top is not calculated from the top of headerView to previous section. Will isDecerating be true when you call selectItemAt:postion:animated: of UIScrollView? isDecerating is true when scrollView is moving after user lifts finger So this is not called, when you set UIScrollView’s offset with animation. How to implement cell’s size changing animation. Implement new size in collectionView:collectionViewLayout:sizeForItem: Call collectionView.collectionViewLayout.invalidateLayout()

entry.title: Is indexPathsForVisibleItems sorted?
entry.content:
• How to fix bug of calling selectItem:at:position:animation of UICollectionView sometimes does not trigger isSelected state changing?
    • It seem to be a bug of UICollectionView, sometime, the when call this method, the isSelected state of the target cell is not changed.
    • Call UICollectionView.reloadData() first
    • Then call selectItem:at:position:animation
  • How to draw a bezierPath with some corners round clipped.
    • Using medthod init(roundedRect: byRounddingCorners:cornderRadii)
    • You can pass needed corner to UIRectCorner
  • How to get differences of a file with a history version in git?
    • Gd #md5OfCommit #filepath
  • Is the first indexPath always the first indexPath in indexPathsForVisibleItems?
    • No
    • So if you want to get the topMost cell that is visible now, you should sort this array first
entry.summary: How to fix bug of calling selectItem:at:position:animation of UICollectionView sometimes does not trigger isSelected state changing? It seem to be a bug of UICollectionView, sometime, the when call this method, the isSelected state of the target cell is not changed. Call UICollectionView.reloadData() first Then call selectItem:at:position:animation How to draw a bezierPath with some corners round clipped. Using medthod init(roundedRect: byRounddingCorners:cornderRadii) You can pass needed corner to UIRectCorner How to get differences of a file with a history version in git? Gd #md5OfCommit #filepath Is the first indexPath always the first indexPath in indexPathsForVisibleItems? No So if you want to get the topMost cell that is visible now, you should sort this array first

entry.title: How to get int part and float part of a price decimal

link.title: How to get int part and float part of a price decimal

entry.content:
• How to get int part and float part of a price decimal?
    • Int part: Floor((decimal as NSDecimal).doubleValue)
    • Decimal part: (decimall * Decimal(100)).IntValue - (Int part) * 100
  • How to implement price with int on left and decimal part on right top?
    • Get different parts of the decimal
    • Use formater to change integer to price and delete .00 at the end
    • Place “.” before decimal part * 100
    • Use two labels to represent them
    • Adjust constraints
      • Make a container view
      • Add the two views as subviews
      • Make left.left.equalToSuperview
      • Make right.right.equalToSuperview
      • Make left.right.equalTo(right.left)
      • Make container.centerX.equalToSuperView
      • Make conatiner.left.greaterOrEqualTo(superView)
      • Make right part’s compressionResistancePriority to low
        • Make right part adjust fontSizeWithWidth
        • In this way when the int part is too big ,the right part will be compressed to small fonts
    • LeftEdge left.right RightEdge
    • LeftEdgeleftxxxxxxxxx.rightRightEdge
entry.summary: How to get int part and float part of a price decimal? Int part: Floor((decimal as NSDecimal).doubleValue) Decimal part: (decimall * Decimal(100)).IntValue - (Int part) * 100 How to implement price with int on left and decimal part on right top? Get different parts of the decimal Use formater to change integer to price and delete .00 at the end Place “.” before decimal part * 100 Use two labels to represent them Adjust constraints Make a container view Add the two views as subviews Make left.left.equalToSuperview Make right.right.equalToSuperview Make left.right.equalTo(right.left) Make container.centerX.equalToSuperView Make conatiner.left.greaterOrEqualTo(superView) Make right part’s compressionResistancePriority to low Make right part adjust fontSizeWithWidth In this way when the int part is too big ,the right part will be compressed to small fonts LeftEdge left.right RightEdge LeftEdgeleftxxxxxxxxx.rightRightEdge

entry.title: How to add an imageView to collectionView as background

link.title: How to add an imageView to collectionView as background

entry.content:
• What are the three ways to track where is the user from?
    • Idfa and cookie
    • Google play url
    • Common info
      • Device id
      • Mac address
      • IP address
      • Device name
      • Wifi mac address
      • Region
      • Local
  • How to add a view to collectionView’s background and send to back?
    • The view should be userInteractive set to false
    • Add it as subview
    • Send back
    • Make layer’s zposition to negative value
  • How to set substring’s attributes for an attributes string?
    • In SwifAttributed string, get range of substring, check if it is NSNotfound
    • If not, set(style: forRange:)
entry.summary: What are the three ways to track where is the user from? Idfa and cookie Google play url Common info Device id Mac address IP address Device name Wifi mac address Region Local How to add a view to collectionView’s background and send to back? The view should be userInteractive set to false Add it as subview Send back Make layer’s zposition to negative value How to set substring’s attributes for an attributes string? In SwifAttributed string, get range of substring, check if it is NSNotfound If not, set(style: forRange:)

entry.title: How to determine where our user is from

link.title: How to determine where our user is from

entry.content:
• How to determine where our user is from? Organic or not? From which ads platform? Form which campaign?
    • Enable IDFA Track
    • Install AppsFlyerSDK
    • Set appsflyer delegate
    • In the delegate method, you can get the values about current user
    • Available keys and values are here
      • https://support.appsflyer.com/hc/en-us/articles/207032096-Deferred-Deep-Linking-Getting-the-Conversion-Data#ResponseKeys
entry.summary: How to determine where our user is from? Organic or not? From which ads platform? Form which campaign? Enable IDFA Track Install AppsFlyerSDK Set appsflyer delegate In the delegate method, you can get the values about current user Available keys and values are here https://support.appsflyer.com/hc/en-us/articles/207032096-Deferred-Deep-Linking-Getting-the-Conversion-Data#ResponseKeys

entry.title: How to distinguish client languages from http request

link.title: How to distinguish client languages from http request

entry.content:
• How to map a dictionary to another dictionary?
    • You can write an extension, new a new dictionary
    • Get the transform block
    • And set key value to the new dictionary
  • What is the protocol that make the class object able to change to string?
    • CustomStringConvertible
    • This is a protocol with one method: description
    • This is not only for debug print, is also used for change objects to strings, like to a url
  • What is the debug version protocol that make the class object able to change to string?
    • CustomDebugStringConvertible
    • Swift works for any type, but it is discouraged to use this directly
  • How should you return contents of different languages according to client requests?
    • Respect accept-language in http header
  • How should throw exceptions and how should you write method that can throw?
    • Throw error
  • What is the differences between normal refresh and hard refresh on frontend?
    • All the js files are refreshed in hard refresh
entry.summary: How to map a dictionary to another dictionary? You can write an extension, new a new dictionary Get the transform block And set key value to the new dictionary What is the protocol that make the class object able to change to string? CustomStringConvertible This is a protocol with one method: description This is not only for debug print, is also used for change objects to strings, like to a url What is the debug version protocol that make the class object able to change to string? CustomDebugStringConvertible Swift works for any type, but it is discouraged to use this directly How should you return contents of different languages according to client requests? Respect accept-language in http header How should throw exceptions and how should you write method that can throw? Throw error What is the differences between normal refresh and hard refresh on frontend? All the js files are refreshed in hard refresh

entry.title: How to edit files in MacOS

link.title: How to edit files in MacOS

entry.content:
• How to do localization of app name, privacy text?
    • Get string keys
    • Localize InfoPlist.String
    • Input key = “value”;
  • Where are the keys of the privacy keys?
    • https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Reference/InfoPlistKeyReference/Articles/CocoaKeys.html
  • What are the two different ways to declare privacy descriptions?
    • Use keys in https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Reference/InfoPlistKeyReference/Articles/CocoaKeys.html
    • Or use Privacy-xxxxxx
  • How to perform choose path action, and get a path?
    • New Panel
    • Config whether file, folder can be selected
    • Present
    • Check action, if action is ok, get url from property of panel
  • How to write file in folder that user selected?
    • Use panel to select a folder
    • Set com.apple.security.files.user-selected.read-write to true
entry.summary: How to do localization of app name, privacy text? Get string keys Localize InfoPlist.String Input key = “value”; Where are the keys of the privacy keys? https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Reference/InfoPlistKeyReference/Articles/CocoaKeys.html What are the two different ways to declare privacy descriptions? Use keys in https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Reference/InfoPlistKeyReference/Articles/CocoaKeys.html Or use Privacy-xxxxxx How to perform choose path action, and get a path? New Panel Config whether file, folder can be selected Present Check action, if action is ok, get url from property of panel How to write file in folder that user selected? Use panel to select a folder Set com.apple.security.files.user-selected.read-write to true
